introduction: You'll answer questions about your situation and your finances to get an estimate of what benefits (eg Income Support or Jobseeker's Allowance) and tax credits you could be entitled to. You'll be shown how to apply for each of the benefits you could claim.
more_information:
%This calculator will time out after 20 minutes - if you need more time you can save your answers and return to it later.%

Use this service to get benefit advice for you, your family or someone else. You can answer questions anonymously about your savings, income and outgoings.

You can save your answers for 7 days, and download or print your results.

This service isn't accurate for:

- prisoners
- [students](/extra-money-pay-university "Extra money to pay for university")
- under 18s
- people living outside the UK
overview: Work out what benefits you could be eligible for, get an estimate of the amount of benefit you could get and apply for the benefits you're likely to be able to claim
title: Benefits calculator
